body_html:
Thanks for providing a self-contained example to reproduce the issue. That's always useful!

'device:XLA_CPU:0' is used primarily for testing. Please take a look at https://www.tensorflow.org/performance/xla/jit for instructions on other ways to invoke XLA.

#17458 discusses this in more details.

Closing this issue but feel free to file a new issue in case you run into an actual bug after following the XLA guide.

body:
Thanks for providing a self-contained example to reproduce the issue. That's always useful!

'device:XLA_CPU:0' is used primarily for testing. Please take a look at https://www.tensorflow.org/performance/xla/jit for instructions on other ways to invoke XLA.

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/17458 discusses this in more details.

Closing this issue but feel free to file a new issue in case you run into an actual bug after following the XLA guide.
